abstract: Former archbishop of San Francisco, Cardinal William Joseph Levada, is due in court Sept 24 after being arrested on suspicion of drunk driving while vacationing in Hawaii.
lead_paragraph: Cardinal William Joseph Levada, a former archbishop of San Francisco, is due in Kona District Court on Sept. 24 after being arrested on suspicion of drunken driving last week.

headline.main: Hawaii: Former San Francisco Archbishop Faces a Charge of Drunken Driving
headline.print_headline: Hawaii: Former San Francisco Archbishop Faces a Charge of Drunken Driving

snippet: Cardinal William Joseph Levada, a former archbishop of San Francisco, is due in Kona District Court on Sept. 24 after being arrested on suspicion of drunken driving last week.
